Uses of FileTask in org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.tasks
 

Subinterfaces of FileTask in org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.tasks
 interface FileBrowserTask
          Describes a file browser task.
 interface FileCopy
          Describes a task for copying a set of files to a file location.
 interface FileDeletion
          Describes a task for deleting a set of files.
 interface FileDownload
          Describes a task to download a remote file to a local location.
 interface FileListing
          Describes a task for listing files at a file location.
 interface FileMakeDir
          Describes a task for making a dir at a file location.
 interface FileMove
          Describes a task for moving a file set to a file location.
 interface FileNameChange
          Describes a task for changing the file name of a file object at a specified file location to a specified file name.
 interface FileTransfer
          Describes a task to transfer a specified set of files to a specified file location.
 interface FileUpload
          Describes a task to upload a local file to a remote location.
